name: toughly
content:
toughly adverb
(STRONG)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not easily broken or made weaker: These boots are very toughly made.
in a forceful and determined way: The organization's members have agreed to try to enforce its rules more toughly. We have to negotiate toughly and get our way. The newspaper published a toughly worded article about racist behaviour.
